Description: 2016 EVH Wolfgang Special "Raised on Stage" Matte Army Green Electric Guitar. Full Disclosure:Guitar is in vg condition. Does not show much signs of use.Minor use at strumming area; not visible in photograph.As seen in photo of the back of guitar, a nail-size chip in the middle of rear body.No buckle rash.Tremolo bar is included despite not being pictured. ** To purchase a case with this guitar, contact seller. Body: BasswoodBody Shape: WolfgangBody Finish: Gloss UrethaneBody Binding: Single-Ply Ivoroid, Black on Vintage White Frets: 22Fret Size: Jumbo * Stainless Steel Frets Position Inlays: BlackFingerboard Radius: 12" to 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm - 406.4 mm)Fingerboard: MapleNeck Material: Bolt-on QuartersawnMaple NeckNeck Finish: Hand-Rubbed UrethaneNut Width: 1.625" (41.30 mm)Scale Length: 25.5" (64.8 cm)Truss Rod: Heel-Mounted Spoke Wheel Adjustment Pickup Configuration: H/HPickups: EVH Direct-Mount Wolfgang HumbuckingPickup Switching: 3-Position Toggle Switching Postion One: Bridge Pickup Position Two: Bridge and Neck Pickups Position Three: Neck Pickup Controls: Master Volume, Master ToneHardware: Black Bridge: EVH-Branded Floyd Rose Locking Tremolo with EVH D-TUNAString Nut: EVH R2 Locking NutIncludes Tremolo Bar Came with Eddie's preferred, reversed 3-way toggle switch.
